channel.title: Stuff I Would Personally Like To Know
channel.description:
Okay here is what I would PERSONALLY like to know to see how things interact
- A 1v1 ladder resolve
- A OoO(Order Of Operations) which is public so we know what classes act first.
- Why there are so many good class ideas that are not being implemented (Yes I know it takes time to code but for real, there have been MANY classes during Beta/Alpha that would be great to see in the game. I.E Maid and others that I can't remember. It feels like you are ignoring good classes imo) - A Torando killing the killer, (I.E Cw redirects assassin to himself. Cannot remember if this has been said but I'm forgetting)
- Why does scorned commit seppuku after she wins? Maybe she gets a gold bonus if she gets BOTH targets lynched?

item.title: Stuff I Would Personally Like To Know

item.description:
But epic mafia is totally most definitely 100% perfectly balanced with roles such as “paranoid cop” and “tree”

Read full topic

item.title: Stuff I Would Personally Like To Know
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:
Okay here is what I would PERSONALLY like to know to see how things interact

  • A 1v1 ladder resolve

  • A OoO(Order Of Operations) which is public so we know what classes act first.

  • Why there are so many good class ideas that are not being implemented (Yes I know it takes time to code but for real, there have been MANY classes during Beta/Alpha that would be great to see in the game. I.E Maid and others that I can’t remember. It feels like you are ignoring good classes imo)

  • A Torando killing the killer, (I.E Cw redirects assassin to himself. Cannot remember if this has been said but I’m forgetting)

  • Why does scorned commit seppuku after she wins? Maybe she gets a gold bonus if she gets BOTH targets lynched?

Read full topic
item.source: Stuff I Would Personally Like To Know
